reviewText: Had all kinds of interesting history on Sheldon.  I can appreciate the challenge it must have created to acquire and compile all the rare footage and interviews.  A bit over-the-top at times in story-telling, but spot-on at other times.  Wish it included a LOT more of the science and calculations.  Alas, not enough. But since that might bore some people this video hits a happy tepid medium I suppose.  Thus, 3 stars.
